https://tmrev.io/movie/529221-Black Is Beltza 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1WQJjJ9mkEeKuZ1kdLtxN8DmCAJ.jpg New York City, October 10, 1965. A group of wooden giant figures from Pamplona, representing Basque culture and traditions, parade down the street; but the local authorities have not allowed the appearance of all of them: due to the racial prejudices that persist in many sectors of society, the participation of two black giants has been banned. Black Is Beltza
